title: Spaghetti with meatballs
directions: Heat the olive oil in a pan.
Add the onion and saute over medium heat until translucent, 5 to 10 minutes.
Add the garlic and cook for 1 more minute. Add the wine and cook on high heat, scraping up all the brown bits in the pan, until almost all the liquid evaporates, about 3 minutes.
Stir in the tomatoes, parsley, leaves, salt, and pepper.
Add vegetarian meatballs to the sauce, cover, and simmer on the lowest heat for 5 minutes, until the meatballs are cooked through.
Serve hot on cooked spaghetti and pass the grated Parmesan.
ingredients: 1/2 cup good red wine, such as Chianti
1 (28-ounce) can crushed tomatoes, or plum tomatoes in puree, chopped
1 1/2 pounds spaghetti, cooked according to package directions
